chat: TTao: Problem: (unset). We steer by simple, green checks.
Thread Sovereign: One step: Run hive:daily and fill Board; commit one safe improvement (e.g., overview/standardize turn) | Win: dup==0 && smoke:pass && frozen:pass && miss==0
Faultline Seeker: Probe: Design 1–3 micro-tests for riskiest assumption in Board; run replay on a new short trace. Stop when Stop rule hit (signal or timeout) on at least one probe.
Prism Magus: Same goal—Run prism_reframe.mjs with goal from Board to compare baseline vs new angle. Keep the winner.
Web Cartographer: Adopt ports/adapters for the next seam; land the smallest first step. Smallest step first.
